ai-patthana12.9:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.9:2.1_1: nor does he for the sake of defilements.
ai-patthana12.9:3.1_1: doesn’t for the sake of undefiled freedom.
ai-patthana12.9:4.1_0: Nor do they break into ending defilements.
ai-patthana12.9:4.1_1: Dispelling mindfulness, and not because of defiling defilements ...
ai-patthana12.9:5.1_0: Noble for the sake of vanity and for the sake of defeat.
ai-patthana12.9:6.1_1: Defiled by defilements, not because of defiling defilements,
ai-patthana12.9:6.1_2: Defiled by defilements, not because of defiling defilements,
